original_title: Jelly Roll : Live From Bridgestone Arena
overview: A live recording of Jelly Roll’s sold out show at Bridgestone Arena in Nashville, Tennessee, on December 9th, 2022. This film is set to have limited screenings in theaters in 2023. More information to come from Jelly Roll’s management team. Confirmed project as of April 20th, 2023.
title: Jelly Roll : Live From Bridgestone Arena
